Uses of Package
com.microsoft.azure.management.gallery

  • Packages that use com.microsoft.azure.management.gallery 
    Package Description
    com.microsoft.azure.management.gallery
    This package contains the classes for InsightsManagementClient.

    RetentionPolicy
    Specifies the retention policy for the log.
    RuleAction
    The action that is performed when the alert rule becomes active, and when an alert condition is resolved.
    RuleCondition
    The condition that results in the alert rule being activated.
    RuleDataSource
    The resource from which the rule collects its data.
    RuleEmailAction
    Specifies the action to send email when the rule condition is evaluated.

    RuleMetricDataSource

    RuleWebhookAction
